;+ ; NAME: ; RMS ; ; PURPOSE: ; Calculates the root-mean-square of a set of values. Extra parameters such ; as DIMENSION are passed through to MEAN. ; ; CATEGORY: ; Math ; ; CALLING SEQUENCE: ; Result = RMS(X) ; ; INPUTS: ; X: Array of values. ; ; OUTPUTS: ; Calculates the square root of the mean of the squares of X. ; ; EXAMPLE: ; x = 4. * RANDOMN(seed, 10000) ; rmsx = RMS(x) ; ; MODIFICATION HISTORY: ; Written by: Jeremy Bailin ; 12 June 2008 Public release in JBIU ; 27 May 2015 Added _EXTRA to mean call ;- function rms, X, _extra=ex return, sqrt(mean(X^2, _strict_extra=ex)) end
